comment.brief: Neither this element nor its children will be hit tested.
comment.full: Neither this element nor its children will be hit tested.

comment.brief: The element will be hit tested based on its appearance.
comment.full: The element will be hit tested based on its appearance.

comment.brief: The element will be hit tested based on its size.
comment.full: The element will be hit tested based on its size.

comment.brief: Only the cildren of this element will be hit tested.
comment.full: Only the cildren of this element will be hit tested.

comment.brief: Hit testing will include the appearance of the element and its children.
comment.full: Hit testing will include the appearance of the element and its children.

comment.brief: Hit testing will include the size of the element and its children.
comment.full: Hit testing will include the size of the element and its children.

comment.brief: Hit testing will include the size of the element and its children.
comment.full: Hit testing will include the size of the element and its children.
